metadata.title: CVE-2017-17519 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: batteriesConfig.mlp in OCaml Batteries Included (aka ocaml-batteries) 2.6does not validate strings before launching the program specified by theBROWSER environment variable, which might allow remote attackers to conductargument-injection attacks via a crafted URL.

criterions.comment: ocaml-batteries: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
